data.title: Iran Games
data.meta_description: Iran is a country located between Central Asia, South Asia, and the Middle East. Its population is over seventy million.
data.text:
1979 Revolution: Black Friday

April 5, 2016

MAC

PC

+ 6 more

IPHN

IPAD

ANDR

XONE

PS4

NSW

An action-adventure, choice-driven game where playing as a photo journalist Reza, set during the Iranian revolution of 1979. The game sets the player in real events of the revolution.

Total War: Rome II

September 3, 2013

MAC

PC

LIN

The successor to the acclaimed Rome: Total War and the eighth main entry in the Total War series, Total War: Rome II returns the series to classical antiquity.

Battlefield 3

October 25, 2011

X360

PS3

+ 2 more

PS3N

PC

Battlefield 3 is DICE's third numerical installment in the Battlefield franchise. It features a single player and co-operative campaign, as well as an extensive multiplayer component.

Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands

May 18, 2010

PSP

X360

+ 6 more

PS3

Wii

DS

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Ubisoft returns to the Sands of Time universe for a fourth time in this May 2010 release, set in between the first two games in the trilogy and coinciding with the release of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time movie.

Prince of Persia: The Fallen King

December 2, 2008

DS

A Prince of Persia game exclusive to the DS. Players control the Prince with the stylus in a 2-D action-platformer.

Prince of Persia: Rival Swords

April 3, 2007

PSP

Wii

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones was later ported to the PSP and Wii. The result was titled Prince of Persia: Rival Swords. Motion controls added by the Wii version is the primary differentiation between the port and the original game.

Prince of Persia: Revelations

December 5, 2005

PSP

PSPN

Prince of Persia: Revelations is a port of 2004's Warrior Within for the PlayStation Portable, with 3 additional areas not found in the original game.

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones

December 1, 2005

MAC

PS2

+ 4 more

GCN

XBOX

PS3N

PC

The Two Thrones is the third game and supposed end for the Sands Of Time saga. It follows the Prince's quest to finish the corrupted, power-hungry Vizier and his negative parts of his mind.

Project Reality: BF2

July 8, 2005

PC

Project Reality is a combined arms First Person Shooter which is based around realism and teamwork oriented gameplay, it's a stand-alone total conversion modification for Battlefield 2.

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

November 30, 2004

PS2

GCN

+ 4 more

XBOX

PS3N

PC

IPHN

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is the the second game in the Sands of Time series. Adopting a much darker tone, Warrior Within follows the Prince to the Island of Time as he attempts to change the past in order to end the Dahaka's relentless pursuit.

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

October 28, 2003

GBA

PS2

+ 5 more

GCN

XBOX

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is an action-adventure game with a heavy focus on platforming. The story revolves around the wry Prince, a time-altering dagger, and a kingdom beset by a plague-like evil.

Freaky Flyers

August 5, 2003

PS2

GCN

XBOX

Freaky Flyers is a mascot-style racing game that puts characters into tiny, cartoonish planes with power-ups that can help turn the tide of a race.

Prince of Persia 2: The Shadow & The Flame

October 1996

SNES

MAC

+ 6 more

XBOX

PC

IPHN

FMT

IPAD

ANDR

The Shadow and The Flame is the sequel to Jordan Mechner's classic platform game, featuring many new locations filled with traps and other dangers.

Heracles no Eikou 3: Kamigami no Chinmoku

April 24, 1992

SNES

WSHP

+ 2 more

WiiU

NSW

The third game in the RPG series known in the west as Glory of Heracles. It was originally released on the Super Famicom in 1992, and eventually added to the Wii's Virtual Console library fifteen years later in 2007. It is the most famous entry in the series.

Aerobiz

April 5, 1992

GEN

SNES

X68K

Business simulation game from Koei released for the SNES and Genesis. Known in Japan as "Air Management: Oozora ni Kakeru", which was also released for the Sharp X68000.

Time Twist: Rekishi no Katasumi de...

July 26, 1991

FDS

A non-corporeal protagonist meets historical figures while travelling through time trying to recover his body from an evil demon in this Famicom Disk System adventure game.
